Topic.Title: Account registration and emails are working again

Posts.EditableText:
Emails from the site are now working again, which means the following things should now work properly once more:

- creating a new account (here and on ActiveLit)
- the "forgot password" form
- the "contact us" form
Posts.HTML:
Emails from the site are now working again, which means the following things should now work properly once more:

  • creating a new account (here and on ActiveLit)
  • the "forgot password" form
